name: Know Weakness
text: You are well versed in the susceptibilities of your foes.
benefit: When you successfully identify a creature with the appropriate Knowledge check, you gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls against that creature for 1 round.
text_zh: 你学习过无数怪物寓言和传说，对怪物的弱点知之甚多。
benefit_zh: 每当你成功的通过一个知识检定分析了某种生物，你会对该生物在攻击和伤害检定上获得+1价值，持续1轮。
